meanings.definition: Wash (something) before further washing or processing.
meanings.sent1: I always prewash my clothes before putting them in the washing machine.
meanings.sent2: It is important to prewash fruits and vegetables before eating them.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to prewash the lettuce twice to make sure it was clean.
meanings.sent4: She prewashed her hands before starting the cooking process.
meanings.sent5: Remember to prewash the dishes before loading them into the dishwasher.

meanings.definition: The act of washing something before further washing or processing.
meanings.sent1: Prewashing is a common practice in laundry to ensure cleanliness.
meanings.sent2: The prewashing of the fabric helped remove any excess dye.
meanings.sent3: The prewashing of the car made it sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The prewashing of the vegetables made the salad taste fresher.
meanings.sent5: Proper prewashing can prevent damage to delicate fabrics.
